ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ya, new kakis ;) ... the better though more costly. A full suit of woven compared to a full suit of cloth will be slightly lightly, thus reduces less
ygData.messageBody:
> This info is for LKW the new member?
Ya, new kakis ;)

> Enchanter's "stuff"...
> For your case since you are new, get cloth armour or woven. Woven being
the better though more costly. A full suit of woven compared to a full suit
of cloth will be slightly lightly, thus reduces less STAMINA.

Err, now I dun even have money to buy food and drink ;)

> Enchanters ain't normally the fighters, they stand back and watch and
control the fight/show. At later stages, you are open to a variety of
"transforming". You can morph into monsters as well as animals. Whichever
creature you morph into, you have its powers. Like you morph into wolf, you
run faster and so on.

Cool!

> Do not take up Jewel Craft cos' its useless and cost too much to learn.

Oh, I heard enchanter can only enchant jewel and silver bars, if I dun
train in fewel craft, my chanting target will be limited?

> Keep to eating muffins and milk/water. If I am right, you can get them in
The Office whatever in Freeport since you are based there. Ask Yiyang aka
Alex for help as well as Gary ;-)
Got office ah? Free of charge? Is it far away from the west gate? I now
hunting solo there, die until dun wanna die liao, haha.

Thx for the tips ;)
